name: Slowtide All Day Microfibre Poncho - Unisex
description:
Slowtide’s changing Poncho gives you somewhere warm and private to change. Whether you just finished a long training swim, or a session out in cold swells, the plush recycled polyester is a nice place to warm up.Soft recycled polyester absorbs 4x its weight in water and dries quickly.OEKO-TEX® 100 certified fabric has been tested for harmful substances, to give you confidene that what is next to your skin has been made with the utmost care.Kangaroo pocket has internal access to make changing easy.Double-layer hood cuts down on heat loss and makes short work wet hair.3-snap placket and drawcord help keep the warm in.

        Sustainability
